Buffalo.Dorm Company Corporation:
Dorm Company Corporation, also known as DormCo, is an American online retailer headquartered in Buffalo, NY that specializes in dorm supplies for college students. The company was founded in March 2010 by Jeff Gawronski.


== History ==
In 1999, Gawronski invented and built a product called the Bed Post Shelf and sold these as dorm items to incoming college freshman.
